name: Cat-tastrophe
description:
It’s a Cat-tastrophe!

Our Entry for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. Made by our team at Small Leaf Studios, we put together typing game about a cat causing havoc on a poor programmer trying to meet a deadline. Sound familiar? You play, Nano, a programmer at home with her cat Cheeto; who is up to typical feline mischief. You’re tasked with managing typing out code for your team and cleaning up the messes your cat makes. Careful, if you get too stressed you will end up unfocused! Can you finish your game before the 48 hours pass? Or will the stress get to you and drive you insane?

Features

-DDR Mavis Beacon mini game

-Cat mayhem

-A WHOLE 2 rooms to explore

-Realistic Stress Simulation

-Cleaning up messes

-Cat

Controls

-Wasd(while away from in-game computer): Move

-Esc: Get off computer in game computer

-F: To interact

-Ctrl+S: Save

-Mouse(click): Interact with window

-Keyboard(while at in-game computer): Type line of code
